text: Gabriel Iribarren (born 6 August 1981 in Lanús) is a retired Argentine football player who used to play for Zob Ahan in the Iran Pro League. ==Club career== He joined Zob Ahan in 2010 and played in three Iran Pro League matches and seven AFC Champions League matches. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Continental ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
